content.question: The aspirations expressed by Briand in the passage would be most directly undermined by his failure to recognize

choices.label: the political and economic instability of the German Weimar Republic
the growing influence of communism among the voting populations of France and Germany
the reduced diplomatic role of the United States in Europe as it adopted an isolationist stance
the political and economic crises that turned the newly created democracies in eastern Europe toward authoritarianism

content.answer: the political and economic instability of the German Weimar Republic

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
